website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ MS517, a budget DLP projector geared to classrooms, provides solid data image quality, and video quality suitable for short to mid-length clips.
pros: The BenQ MS517 is a data projector geared to classrooms that provides solid image quality at low cost

customer_reviews.title: SOMETIMES DO NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I used this in a town far away of the city and I had to projet a movie in a church the monitor star to work and shows the BenQ logo on a White back. It looks very good when I used the movie thru my laptop it shows very unclear or dark . I trayed to set up the lamp in another mode but it doesnt work I stop the movie and start again and it shows a Green screen with no imagen and some stripes. I will bring it back to amazon and maybe choose a diferet one
customer_reviews.author: Lulú

customer_reviews.title: Buy Me !! don't buy a Tv!! 💕
customer_reviews.text: I've literally had mine for over 7 years and just now writing a review absolutely love it. Still haven't had to replace the bulb great great product
customer_reviews.author: andrea dragovich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Good picture.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my home theater, great picture and good brightness. One problem for me this is not a short throw. I have mine all the way back (15 ft) in my room, and still don't have the screen size I wanted. Otherwise I like it and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: crusher

customer_reviews.title: Great projector but it requires a lot of room to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great projector but it requires a lot of room to get a big picture. I didn't have enough throw space. I only had 12 ft and the screen was too small. Picture quality and everything else was great. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Ricky Heat

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year
customer_reviews.text: It was bright The 3D worked great The bad part was the fact that it does not get a large pitcher screen The HDMI went out so now the only part that works is the LD video input
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanker

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing for almost 7 years and it's still kicking. Great value, I wouldn't go back to anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: BenQ Projector
customer_reviews.text: I love my projector. The display is great and I love the presentations. It is also great to use for watching movies.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this one
customer_reviews.text: Prior to the purchase of the BenQ I had a $750.00 Optoma that had a life span of just over a year, just beyond warranty period. It was used only on occasions and had roughly 100 hours on the lamp when the unit expired. To have it repaired (something to do with the board) the cost was $350.00 The BenQ is even more powerful and has a better picture quality than the Optoma. We are able to project a clear picture or movie twenty feet away, believe we could go even further if the room would allow.
customer_reviews.author: Wandrinstar

customer_reviews.title: Speakers don't work
customer_reviews.text: This is the second projector they sent me. Still no working speakers. There is no way to contact an customer support Just an answering machine saying it will not take any messages. Do NOT buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Catrine

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very good, exactly what we expected. Excelente image, great colors, very fast start, silent. I like the smart eco mode, is good to save energy.
customer_reviews.author: Amaya Emparan

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It is a really nice Projector it works nicely for me, is just what is was needing. Highly recommended. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: dacko

customer_reviews.title: Performed well past expectations!
customer_reviews.text: The retailer delivered as promised. The projector was great straight out of the box. Easy setup and I look forward to getting one for my game room. Picture was crisp and the 3D could have been better but great for the price point!!! Would totally recommend to anyone looking for a great starter projector!!
customer_reviews.author: Big Perm Zilla's Pit BBQ

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your product, it is, hands-and it works great the nitides is imprecionante and easy to use. I recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use with an outdoors blow-up screen and it is perfect!! Summer nights are extra fun with a "movie on the lawn"!!
customer_reviews.author: nycaw

customer_reviews.title: Only used one time and all guest said COOL!!!
customer_reviews.text: Picture fantastic, set up easy. Glad I made this choice. I looked around and to be honest lots of ways to go, but very happy with my decision.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald F.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: My friend introduce me to buy BenQ's product. It is very good to use. So I like it and introduce it to my another friend.
customer_reviews.author: John Wu

product_meta.title: BenQ MS517 2800 Lumen SVGA DLP Smarteco Projector
product_meta.description:
Offers stunning full-screen presentation with the finest details. View larger THE BEST VALUE CHOICE FOR A SMALL-MEDIUM SPACE
Featuring a brightness of 2800 ANSI lumens, a high contrast ratio of 13000:1 and a SVGA resolution, the cost-effective and eco-friendly MS517 offers a stunning full-screen presentation with the finest details regardless of the ambient light level.

Featuring multiple input options to fit every need. View larger SMARTECO
WORLD-LEADING SMARTECO TECHNOLOGY FOR A GREENER ENVIRONMENT
As the first DLP brand to incorporate Philips' ImageCare technology into its projector lamp system, BenQ has taken a further leap, developing its own SmartEco Technology to perfect what DLP can do for energy saving in the 21st century classroom. Built with this brand new invention, the MS517 brings together uncompromised brightness, exquisite picture quality and optimized lamp life through innovative features.

Blank the projection screen whenever you need to redirect the students' focus. View larger 
Save up to 70% of your lamp power with No Source Detected mode. View larger ECO BLANK MODE
The Eco Blank mode allows teachers to blank the projection screen whenever they need to direct their students' focus back on them--or simply when the projector is not in use. When activated, this special feature dims the lamp power automatically, lowering the total power consumption by up to 70%.

Lamp power is automatically adjusted to maximize saving. View larger SMART ECO MODE
The Smart Eco mode is designed to use only the exact amount of lamp power a projector needs to deliver the best contrast performance. With this feature, schools get to provide students and teachers uncompromised projection quality and reduce the total cost of ownership by extending the lamp life and lowering power consumption.

NO SOURCE DETECTED MODE
There will be times when a projector is turned on without a display source, such as a classroom PC or notebook. To avoid a projector from running with full lamp power, BenQ created the No Source Detected Mode to lower the projector lamp brightness to 30% after the projector has remained unconnected to a display source for more than three minutes.

0.5W IN STANDBY MODE
When inactive, the MS517 keeps power consumption to a minimum with 0.5W standby power, achieving what was once a challenge for earlier projector models. This technological advancement in energy saving certainly helps extend the projector lamp life and lower energy costs.

THOUGHTFUL FEATURES
The MS517 projector supports 3D Blu-ray via HDMI 
Instant Restart lets you turn the projector back on immediately when it has been switched off by accident SUPPORTS 3D BLU-RAY VIA HDMI
Designed to maximize your audiovisual enjoyment, the MS517 brings to you unlimited 3D entertainment via HDMI. The 3D formats supported are 3D field-sequentials, 3D frame-packing, 3D top-and-bottom and 3D side-by-side.

CLOSED CAPTIONING
Display subtitles in video content without the need for an external closed-captioning device with the MS517. It's perfect for viewing in educational settings such as language classes where a transcript of onscreen dialog is desirable.

USER-FRIENDLY I/O PORT DESIGN
To enable easy access for everyone, the I/O ports are clearly printed on the projector housing so users can find the port they need straight away. No squinting your eyes or bending over for a closer look.

INSTANT RESTART
The Instant Restart feature gives teachers a 90-second window period to turn the projector back on immediately when it has been switched off by accident--no waiting necessary.

Includes teaching templates to make your job easier QUICK COOLING
Cooling time itself has been reduced by over 60%, saving your time and minimizing the risk of heat damage to sensitive internal components.

TEACHING TEMPLATE
To make your teaching job easier, BenQ has added the teaching template function to the MS517. Now, with four different line pattern designs to choose from--Letter Formation, Musical Staff, Worksheet and Coordinate Chart, you can easily write or draw on whiteboards as well as blackboards without the need of drawing lines or charts.

CHOOSE THE RIGHT BENQ VALUE PROJECTOR THAT'S RIGHT FOR YOU

feature_bullets: Eco Blank Mode allows you to blank the projection screen whenever you need to direct your audiences' focus back on them
SmartEco Mode cleverly adjusts the lamp power to maximize power saving by delivering the best contrast and brightness performance using only as much light as needed
No Source Detected Mode automatically switches to Eco Blank Mode after the projector is turned on for over three minutes without a display source
